p: Interestingly, seroprevalence in broiler flocks (17.6%, CI 14.2–21.5) was also significantly lower than that seen in layers (50.3%, CI 42.6–57.4) and broiler breeders (46.5%, CI 33.3–60.1) ( Table 2).The risk of AIV infection was significantly higher for commercial farms with low biosecurity level (sanitary and management failures) as compared to those showing medium to high biosecurity measures (better sanitary and management measures applied) ( Table 1).
